thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 5 of 113
thread.title: Mike
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: I have been looking for a lightweight rucksack for sometime as my trusty Vaude 20 had fallen to bits. This one is incredibly light and comfy. It takes all I need for a day and has enough pockets to make it easy to locate items, a large main pocket and several smaller ones. I am a mature hiker and would recommend this backpack.
